member.name: T:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions
member.summary: Provides static methods for generating exception messages with consistent formatting.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.CheckBefore(System.String)
member.summary: Checks and formats the 'before' parameter, adding a colon separator if not empty.
member.param: The prefix text to check and format.
member.returns: Empty string if is null or whitespace, otherwise with ": " appended.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.IsNotTheSame``1(System.String,System.String,``0,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Checks if two values are not equal and returns an error message if they differ.
member.typeparam: The type of values to compare.
member.param: The prefix for the error message.
The name of the first value.
The name of the second value.
member.returns: An error message if values differ, otherwise null.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.HasNotIndex``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a list has enough elements to access the specified index.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the list.
member.param: The prefix for the error message.
The name of the list for the error message.
The maximum index that must be accessible.
member.returns: An error message if the list doesn't have enough elements, otherwise null.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.TextOfExceptions(System.Exception)
member.summary: Gets all messages from an exception and its inner exceptions.
member.param: The exception to extract messages from.
member.returns: A string containing all exception messages.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.TypeAndMethodName(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Extracts type and method name from a stack trace line.
member.param: The stack trace line to parse.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.IsNullOrWhitespace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if a string argument is null, empty, or whitespace.
member.param: The prefix for the error message.
If true, whitespace-only strings are also considered invalid.
member.returns: An error message if validation fails, otherwise null.

member.name: M:SunamoExceptions.Exceptions.AddParams
member.summary: Adds additional parameter information to exception messages.
member.returns: A formatted string containing additional parameter information.
